markdownRemark.html:
Calvin Ward, the manager of my local ColdFusion User Group, put a very elegant page onto our User Group website about the disaster in the Gulf States with Hurricane Katrinna.

He has links on that page that will allow people to donate to the different NGO that are aiding in the relief effort.

frontmatter.title: I got my Apollo pocket guide yesterday
I am on the Local News, and it was not Perp Walk
